summary: The adventures of a family who head west to the California gold fields in the 1850s.
cast: Glenn Close|Jena Malone|Bruce McGill|Meat Loaf|Chloe Webb|Olivia Burnette|Dennis Christopher|Judy Gold|Michael Welch|Andy Garrison|Wilford Brimley|Robert Pastorelli|Dalin Christiansen|Neblis Francois|Charles Grueber|Elaine Kagan|Celeste Leary|Scott Subiono|David H. Stevens|Nathan Stevens
title: La balada de Lucy Whipple
